Study Mode: Distance

About Dr. DY Patil

Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth is a deemed-to-be university in Pune which was established in the year 2003. Starting off as a medical institution, the university today provides courses across a number of fields, with the best in class educational services.

Dr. D.Y. Patil University is a UGC-approved institution and has the cell- Centre for Online Learning (DPU-COL) dedicated to providing online courses at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels. With the online learning support of the university, an all-round educational service is delivered to the students’ doorstep through virtual means.

D.Y. Patil provides students with UG and PG courses in fields such as management, healthcare management and digital marketing through its online learning cell. The educational services of the university for its online courses include LMS support, online live lecture facilities, virtual course content and learning materials and many more.

Courses in the online mode also have a dedicated placement assistance body, so students can easily get practical and professional exposure integrated with the course as well as find job opportunities in a number of top MNCs and companies through the virtual placement services.

The university provides affordable education to students with a number of fee concession facilities for special and needy categories. Driven by the motto of equitable and democratic access to higher education, the university seeks to provide an indepth learning experience to students through online mode.

  • Reputed University
    • Top accreditations and approvals with excellent reputation
  • Industry-Relevant Courses
    • Course curricula are up to date and industry-relevant

Admission Process

Admission process in the DY Patil University is in online mode. Admission sessions are conducted twice in a year that is in January and July month. No entrance exams are conducted to take admission in the DY Patil university. Admissions are done on direct-basis. The admission procedure 2023 for the online courses at DPU-COL is as follows:

Step 1: Go to the official website of DY Patil Online and click on “Admissions” and then fill in your basic details for mobile number and email verification.

Step 2: Fill in all your basic personal information followed by educational and professional information.

Step 3: Upload all the required documents along with your passport-size photo and signature.

Step 4: Pay the fee online and then submit the form.

Step 5: Once all the documents are verified, your admission confirmation will be sent to you via email or SMS along with your student login credentials

List of Documents
    • Marksheets
    • Residential Proof
    • Proof of Date of Birth
    • Government Issued ID
    • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
    • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
    • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
    • Two passport size colored photographs
    • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why Dr. DY Patil

  • The university has all the accreditations and recognitions for providing full-time online education: UGC-DEB as well as AICTE, NIRF (Rank 41 in University Category), ISO, AIU, ACU, WES and more.
  • Dr. D.Y. Patil University is a NAAC rated A++ institution with a grade point of 3.64.
  • DPU-COL has multifaceted learning support features such as an e-learning toolkit, self-evaluation kits, case studies, university LMS, digital libraries etc.
  • D.Y. Patil University has a separate placement cell dedicated only to the online division of learning, and partners with a large number of companies like American Express, HDFC Bank, Bajaj and many more.
  • The faculty of the university is very well-trained in delivering education through the online mode and is additionally highly qualified and experienced in their fields.
  • The university has a network of over one lakh experienced alumni across the globe.
